member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.DynamicConfigurationFactory
member.summary: Generates a proxy class for a given configuration type based on the input command line arguments.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.DynamicConfigurationFactory.TryCreate(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new proxy intance of required configuration type, populating it from the command line arguments.
member.returns: New instance of required configuration type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.DynamicConfigurationFactory.TryGetConfigurationOptions(System.Type)
member.summary: Based on the configuration type assumes description for configuration options.
member.param: Type of the configuration to get description for.
member.returns: Description of configuration options for specified type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.ConfigurationEnumOptionDescriptionFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One of the following: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.ConfigurationOptionDescriptionFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Expects value of type {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.DynamicConfigurationGenerationFailedFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to generate dynamic configuration class of type '{0}'. Try defining custom configuration factory.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.ConsoleHost.DynamicConfiguration.Resources.UnknownOptionFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unknown configuration option "{0}".

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases. TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing and internal use only
